description: This module is designed to provide Y2, penultimate and final-year female students with the awareness of biases, stereotypes and how it impacts women in the workplace. The module will help students develop their skills around “Breaking the Bias” to ensure they are equipped with the knowledge and skills to succeed in the workplace. It combines physical and virtual workshops where the students will have an opportunity to put their new skills into practice. This module will use a combination of self-directed learning, a group project using principles of human-centred design and mentoring by senior female leaders
title: Women's Professional Development Programme
